column17: Hello!\nWelcome to the Gitainment!
column18: 您好！\n歡迎來到 Gitainment 教學遊戲！

column17: Before the game starts,\nLet me introduce the features and goals of this game.
column18: 在遊戲開始之前\n請讓我介紹一下本遊戲的特色與目標

column17: In this game, you will learn what version control is.\nYou will use Git commands to operate action during the game.
column18: 在這個遊戲中，\n您將會學習到什麼是版本控制\n並且在遊戲過程中會使用 Git 指令來進行操作

column17: Even those without programming experience,\nor people who never used Git version control tools.\nThey can learn these skills through this game.
column18: 就算是沒有寫程式的經驗\n或者是從未使用過 Git 版本控制工具的人\n都可以透過本遊戲來學習這些知識

column17:
The main goals of this game will teach you:
1. Basic concepts of version control and how to use it.
2. The purpose of using each Git command, and how to use them.
3. How to manage projects with these skills.
column18:
本遊戲的主要目標是讓您學會：
1. 版本控制的基本概念以及如何應用它
2. 每個 Git 指令的使用方法和用途
3. 通過 Git 來管理專案

column17: To achieve these goals above,\nthis game simulated the scenarios and problems\nwhich is often encountered in actual project development.
column18: 為了達成上述目標\n本遊戲模擬了實際開發專案時\n經常會遇到的情境和問題

column17: Based on the theme of each scenario,\nthe game has designed multiple stages.
column18: 根據情境的主題\n本遊戲設計了多個遊戲關卡

column17: This way not only helps you learn the knowledge\nat each stage more effectively.
column18: 這種方式不僅能幫助您\n更有效地學習每個關卡中所要傳達的知識

column17: But also allows you to use this knowledge\nin actual project development after completing the game.
column18: 還能讓您在完成遊戲後\n將這些知識實際應用於專案開發中

column17: After introducing the game's goals and features,\nlet's get familiar with the game environment.
column18: 在介紹完遊戲目標和特色後\n讓我們先來熟悉一下遊戲環境吧

column13: CloseImageWindow();\nBlackPanelControl(false);\nFSMEvent("Stage Manager/Load Default Background Story", "Stage Manager Parent", "Background Controller");
column17: First, let's simulate the first game scene.

column17: After establishing the simulated scene,\nyou can see the current story in the 'Story Background' field.
column18: 在建立完模擬場景後\n您可以在 '背景故事' 區域中看到當前的故事

column17: In the game, we play the characters in the simulated scene.\nControl the simulated computer to achieve the main goals of the story.

column17: Once you complete the main goal in the simulated scene,\nyou clear the stage.

column17: Additionally, to ensure you know what to do next during the gameplay.

column17: The main goal will be divided into smaller objectives.\nYou can confirm the current objective at the top left of the game screen.
column18: 本遊戲將模擬背景的主要目標分成多個小目標\n您能夠通過畫面左上角的區域得知當前的遊戲目標

column17: Before we start to complete the first objective,\nlet's confirm the background story together.

column17: Finally, if you encounter any problems during the game,\nplease click here for help.\nLet's start!

column17: Great!\nYou have completed the first objective in the game.\nAnd you earned game points.
column18: 很好！\n您已完成遊戲中的第一個目標\n並獲得了遊戲分數

column17: You can see the game score at the top of the screen.\nBelow the score shows the total time you spent while playing this stage.
column18: 您可以在畫面上方看到遊戲分數\n分數的下方顯示了遊玩這個關卡總花費的時間

column17: When you complete the objective without doing incorrect actions.\nYou will get 1000 points.
column18: 當您達成目標且沒有執行錯誤的操作時\n您將獲得 1000 點分數

column17: If you did the incorrect actions while completing the objective.\nYou will get 750 points.
column18: 如果在達成目標的過程中執行過錯誤的操作\n您將獲得 750 點分數

column17: At the end of the stage,\nyou will receive a rating based on your score.\nEach stage can receive a rating of 1 to 4 stars
column18: 在關卡結束後\n您將根據您的分數獲得不同的評價\n每一個關卡能夠獲得 1 到 4 顆星的評價

column17: This rating can help you confirm how you learn at this stage.\nYou can also see your progress through a personal leaderboard.
column18: 這個評價可以幫助您評估自己對該關卡的學習狀態\n您也可以通過個人排行榜來查看自己是否有進步

column17: Additionally, your performance in the game will be recorded on the global leaderboard.
column18: 另外，您在遊戲中的表現會被記錄在全球排行榜中

column17: Try to earn a score as high as possible.\nAnd become one of the top 10 Git learners!
column18: 請您盡可能地獲得高分\n來成為全球前 10 名的 Git 學習者吧！

column17: Next, let's review what we learned in this stage.
column18: 接下來，讓我們來回顧本次關卡中學到的內容

column17: First, we introduced the game's goals and features,\nand various features in the game,\nsuch as scoring, objectives, and simulated background stories.
column18: 首先，我們介紹了本遊戲的目標和特色\r\n以及遊戲中的各種功能\r\n例如得分、目標和模擬背景故事

column17: Then, we unlocked several features in the game.
column18: 接著，我們解鎖了多個遊戲中的功能

column7: 圖片speechSquare&高亮粒子 幫助
column17: The 'Dialogue feature' not only allows you to review previous conversations\nbut also provides 'Hint' and 'Answer' features.
column18: 協助功能' 不僅允許您回顧先前的對話\r\n還提供 '提示' 和 '解答' 的功能

column7: 高亮粒子 手冊&圖片book&關閉粒子 幫助
column17: The 'Game Manual' is a tool to help you learn.\nAs the game progresses, you will unlock more knowledge.\nPlease use it whenever needed.
column18: 遊戲手冊' 是一個幫助您學習的工具\r\n隨著遊戲進展，您將解鎖更多知識\r\n如果需要的話，請隨時查閱它

column7: 關閉粒子 手冊&高亮FileManager視窗&顯示Hint_FileManagerWindow
column17: The 'File Manager' window allows you to\r\nbrowse the contents of the computer \r\nin the simulated background environment.
column18: 檔案管理' 視窗可以讓您\r\n瀏覽模擬背景環境中的電腦內容

column17: And you can do actions on files:\nadd, modify, delete file contents,\nas well as copy and name files.
column18: 並且可以對文件執行以下操作：\r\n新增、修改、刪除文件內容\r\n以及複製和命名文件

column17: In this stage, we used the actions of backing up files\nto help you get familiar with the game environment.
column18: 在本次關卡裡，我們通過備份檔案的方式\r\n來協助您熟悉遊戲環境

column17: In the next stage, \r\nwe will start learning about version control and Git.
column18: 下一關卡，我們將正式開始學習版本控制和 Git

column17: We will understand their definitions, advantages, and features.\nAt the same time, we will compare\nthe differences between using 'file backup' and 'version control'.
column18: 我們會了解它們的定義、優點和特色\r\n同時，我們將會比較\r\n使用備份檔案和版本控制、Git 的不同之處

column17: Finally, congratulations on completing the stage.\nYou did a great job!
column18: 最後，恭喜您通過了本次的關卡\r\n您做得很棒！

column17: Welcome to the 'Create Your First Local Repository' stage!
column18: 歡迎來到\r\n'創建第一個本地儲存庫' 關卡！

column17: First, let's quickly review what we learned in the previous stage.
column18: 首先，讓我們快速回顧上一關卡中學到的知識

column17: In the last stage, we discussed the problems that can arise from the method of backing up files.
column18: 在上一關中，我們提到了\r\n備份檔案這種方式可能會引發的問題

column17: These problems not only affect the efficiency of project development but also bring difficulties to project management.
column18: 這些問題不僅影響開發專案時的效率\r\n還給專案管理帶來了困難

column17: Then, we introduced version control and Git, along with their features and advantages.
column18: 接著，我們介紹了版本控制和 Git\r\n以及它們的特點和優點

column17: It's clear that using version control in project management can be very helpful.
column18: 由此可知，\r\n在專案管理中使用版本控制能夠帶來很大的幫助

column17: In this stage, we'll start learning how to use Git.
column18: 因此，在本次關卡中\r\n我們要開始學習如何使用 Git

column18: 首先是 '指令記錄' 區域\r\n它記錄著您之前輸入的指令

column17: The button in the top right corner of the window can clear the command history.\nYou can press it if you need it.
column18: 視窗右上角的按鈕可以清除指令記錄\r\n方便您在需要時進行清理

column17: Next is the 'Command Details' area. \r\nThe results of the executed commands will be displayed here.
column18: 接下來是 '指令細節' 區域\r\n指令執行後的結果會顯示在這裡

column17: Also, if you hover the mouse over a command in the 'Command History',\nyou can also see the message after execution.
column18: 此外，將滑鼠移到 '指令記錄' 中的指令上\r\n您也可以看到執行後的訊息

column17: Then, at the bottom, is the 'Enter Command' area.\r\nThis is the most important part of the 'Command Line', \r\nwhere you can enter and execute commands.
column18: 然後，下方的是 '輸入指令' 區域\r\n這是 '命令行' 最重要的部分\r\n您可以在這裡輸入和執行指令

column17: The first line shows the current folder location.\nJust like the 'File Manager' window, the command line also has its current location.
column18: 第一行顯示的是當前資料夾位置\r\n就和 '檔案管理' 視窗一樣\r\n命令行也有它們現在所在的位置

column17: To help your learning of Git commands, \r\nyou only need to move the path in the 'File Manager' window, \r\nand the 'Command Line' window will move in sync.
column18: 為了方便您學習 Git 指令\r\n您只需要在 '檔案管理' 視窗中移動路徑\r\n'命令行' 視窗也會同步移動

column17: The last column is where you enter commands.
column18: 最後一欄是輸入指令的區域

column17: After introducing the features of the 'Command Line' window, \r\nlet's try entering a command right away.
column18: 在介紹完 '命令行' 視窗的功能後\r\n讓我們立即嘗試輸入指令吧

column17: Please note that:\n'when entering commands, the case you enter needs to be the same'\nThis can help Git to recognize the command.
column18: 請注意\r\n'輸入指令時需要保持大小寫一致'\r\nGit 才能識別指令

column17: Now, please click on the input field, \r\nenter '<color=#CF001C>git --version</color>' or '<color=#CF001C>git -v</color>', \r\nand then press the Enter key on your keyboard or the arrow next to the input field to execute your first command.
column18:
現在，請點擊輸入欄
輸入 '<color=#CF001C>git --version</color>' 或 '<color=#CF001C>git -v</color>'
然後按下鍵盤上的 Enter 鍵
或輸入欄旁的箭頭來執行您的第一個指令吧

column17: Excellent! You have successfully executed your first Git command.
column18: 非常好！\r\n您成功地運行了第一個 Git 指令

column17: By using 'git --version' or 'git -v', you can check the Git version currently being used on your computer.
column18: 透過 'git --version' 或 'git -v'\r\n能夠查看電腦上正在使用的 Git 版本

column17: This command also confirms whether Git has been successfully installed on your computer.
column18: 同時，這個指令也能確認\r\n您的電腦是否已成功安裝了 Git

column17: If Git is not installed on your computer yet, \r\nyou will need to visit Git's official website to download it.
column18: 如果電腦尚未安裝 Git\r\n需要前往 Git 的官方網站進行下載

column17: Having executed this simple and easy-to-understand Git command, \r\nI believe you are now confident to go on the next command.
column18: 在執行這個簡單易懂的 Git 指令\r\n相信您有信心去挑戰下一個指令了

column17: Next, let's execute the following command,\nwhich is the first step in creating a Git management system.
column18: 接下來，讓我們執行下一個指令\r\n這個指令是創建 Git 管理系統的第一步

column17: This command is '<color=#CF001C>git init</color>',\nwhere 'init' is the abbreviation for 'initialize'.
column18: 這個指令的名稱是 '<color=#CF001C>git init</color>'\r\n'init' 是 'initialize'（初始化）的縮寫

column17: This means that by executing 'git init', \r\nyou can create a new Git management system on your computer.
column18: 也就是說：\r\n通過執行 'git init'\r\n能夠在電腦上創建一個全新的 Git 管理系統

column17: However, before creating this management system,\nyou must first move to the project path that you want to manage.
column18: 然而，在創建管理系統之前\r\n要先移動到需要管理的專案路徑

column17: Creating a management system in the wrong location\nmay track files unrelated to the project.
column18: 如果在錯誤的位置創建管理系統\r\n可能會追蹤到與專案無關的檔案

column7: 白屏&關閉圖片&(新增任務)&(解鎖按鈕 - 檔案管理)
column17: According to the story,\nplease first move to the path where management is needed.
column18: 根據故事情節\r\n請您先移動到需要進行管理的路徑

column17: Great, you have successfully moved to the project location.
column18: 好的，您已經成功地移動到了專案位置

column17: Now, we can proceed to the next step: \r\ncreating your first Git management system.
column18: 現在，我們可以繼續進行下一個步驟\r\n創建您的第一個 Git 管理系統

column17: Before we begin, \r\nlet me introduce a few very practical features in the 'Command Line' window.\r\nThese tips can help you operate commands more effectively.
column18: 在開始之前\r\n讓我再向您介紹幾個在 '命令行' 視窗中非常實用的功能\r\n這些小技巧能夠幫助您更有效地操作指令

column17: First, pay attention to the lens icon next to the input field.\nYou can use the search function by pressing the Tab key on your keyboard or clicking on the icon.
column18: 首先，請注意在輸入欄旁的放大鏡圖標\r\n您可以通過鍵盤上的 Tab 鍵或者點擊圖標\r\n來使用搜尋功能

column17: This is particularly useful when you haven't memorized Git commands \r\nor when you need to complete a command quickly.
column18: 這對於在還沒有記住 Git 指令\r\n或著是需要快速完成指令時特別有用

column17: Additionally, after clicking on the input field,\nuse the 'up' and 'down' arrow keys on your keyboard\nto quickly fill in previously executed commands.
column18: 另外，在點擊輸入欄後\r\n使用鍵盤上的方向鍵 '上' 和 '下'\r\n來快速填入以前執行過的指令

column13: FSMEvent("Quest Tracker/Add New Quest", "Quest Tracker Parent", "Quest Tracker");\nHintController("CommandFooter",false );\nUnlockGameManualItem("C/git init/1");
column17: Next, please execute '<color=#CF001C>git init</color>'\nat your project location to create your first Git management system.
column18: 接下來，請您在專案位置上執行 '<color=#CF001C>git init</color>'\r\n來創建您的第一個 Git 管理系統

column17: Well done! \r\nAfter executing the 'git init' command,\r\na new folder appeared in your project location.
column18: 做得好！\r\n當您執行了 'git init' 指令之後\r\n專案位置上多了一個新資料夾

column17: This command creates a folder named '.git' at the specified location.
column18: 執行該指令後\r\nGit 會在指定位置上創建一個名為 '.git' 的資料夾

column17: This folder is 'hidden' in the computer system,\nmeaning you do not need to modify its contents directly.\nInstead, you will use various Git commands to interact with it.
column18: 這個資料夾在電腦系統中是 '隱藏' 的\r\n這意味著您不需要直接去修改它的內容來與它進行互動

column17: .git' is the core of the entire Git system.\r\nIt contains important information related to the project, \r\nsuch as versions of submissions, authors, time, etc.
column18:
相反，您將使用各種 Git 指
'.git' 是整個 Git 系統的核心
它包含了與專案相關的重要信息
例如提交的版本內容、作者、時間等

column17: Without the '.git' folder, most Git commands cannot operate normally.
column18: 如果沒有 '.git' 資料夾\r\n大部分的 Git 指令是無法正常運作的

column17: Now, let me briefly introduce the three areas that are contained in Git:
column18: 現在，讓我來簡單介紹一下組成 Git 的三個區域：

column17: First is the 'Working Directory.' \r\nThis area is actually the project location you chose.
column18: 首先是 '工作目錄' (Working Directory)\r\n這個區域實際上就是您選擇的專案位置

column17: All files in the 'Working Directory' are tracked by Git, \r\nwhich is the 'Ongoing Project' folder.
column18: 工作目錄' 中的所有檔案都會被 Git 追蹤\r\n也就是 '開發中的專案' 這個資料夾

column17: Next is the 'Staging Area.' \r\nThis area acts as a bridge between the 'Working Directory' and the '.git' folder.
column18: 接著是 '暫存區域' (Staging Area)\r\n這個區域在 '工作目錄' 和 '.git' 資料夾之間\r\n擔任了橋樑的角色

column17: You can push file modification contents\nfrom the 'Working Directory' to the 'Staging Area'.
column18: 您可以把檔案修改內容\r\n從 '工作目錄' 推送到 '暫存區域'

column17: Then move the confirmed files to the '.git' to create a record.
column18: 然後將確認好的檔案移動到 '儲存庫' 形成一個記錄

column17: Finally, the 'Repository.' \r\nThe management system created on your local computer is called the 'Local Repository.'
column18: 最後是 '儲存庫' (Repository)\r\n在本地電腦創建的管理系統\r\n稱為 '本地儲存庫' (Local Repository)

column17: In fact, the 'Repository' is the '.git' folder.
column18: 而實際上，'儲存庫' 指的就是 '.git' 資料夾

column17: In the upcoming stages, \r\nwe will introduce in more detail the 'Staging Area' and 'Local Repository,' \r\nand operate them using Git commands.
column18:
在接下來的關卡中
我們將更詳細地介紹
'暫存區域' 和 '本地儲存庫' 這兩個區域
並使用 Git 指令來操作它們

column17: With this operation, \r\nyou have successfully achieved the simulation scenario's objective.
column18: 經過本次的操作，\r\n您成功地達成了模擬場景的目標

column17: Using the newly unlocked 'Command Line' window,\nyou executed the 'git -v' and 'git init' commands\nto create a new Git management system.
column18: 通過新解鎖的 '命令行' 視窗\r\n執行 'git -v' 和 'git init' 指令\r\n來創建新的 Git 管理系統

column17: We also understood the role and structure of the '.git' folder.
column18: 我們也了解 '.git' 資料夾的作用和裡面的結構

column17: In the next stage,\r\nwe will further understand \r\nthe contents of the 'Staging Area' and operate it through commands.
column18: 在下一關卡\r\n我們將進一步瞭解 '暫存區域' 的內容\r\n並通過指令來操作它

column17: Finally, congratulations on completing this tutorial stage.\nWell done!
column18: 最後，恭喜您順利完成本次教學關卡\r\n做得好！

column8: 版本控制 與 Git 的介紹（之後要改程式）\r
column17: Welcome to the 'Introduction to Version Control and Git' stage!
column18: 歡迎來到\r\n'版本控制與 Git 的介紹' 關卡！

column17: In this stage, we will focus on explaining concepts without practical operations.\r\nHowever, in the end, there’s a quiz to enhance your understanding.
column18: 本次關卡將專注於概念的解釋而不包含實際操作\r\n然而，在關卡的最後會有一個測驗來鞏固您學到的知識

column17: Correct answers will give you 1000 points.\nIncorrect answers will not get any points.
column18: 當回答問題正確就可以獲得 1000 分\r\n而回答錯誤，就無法獲得分數

column17:
There are four chapters in this stage:
1. Review the Stage 1
2. What is Version Control?
3. What is Git?
4. Summary
column18:
本次關卡將分為四個章節：
1. 回顧第 1 關卡
2. 什麼是版本控制？
3. 什麼是 Git？
4. 總結

column17: At the end of each chapter, you can choose whether to continue to the next chapter.
column18: 在每一章節結束後\r\n您可以選擇是否繼續下一章節\r\n以便更好地吸收所學知識

column17: If you have already taken a break and want to continue, please click here to learn.
column18: 當您已經休息完成後，請點擊這裡來繼續學習

column17: In Stage 1, we used the 'backup file' method to complete the midterm presentation.
column18: 在第 1 關卡中\r\n我們使用 '備份檔案' 的方法來完成期中簡報

column17: Although this method is direct and fast, \r\nit can cause problems when dealing with more complex presentations or projects.
column18: 儘管這是一種直接且快速的方法\r\n但是這種方式在處理更為複雜的簡報或專案時會造成問題

column17: First, if there’s a large number of backup files during development, \r\nit will be difficult to track the differences between files.
column18: 第一，如果您在開發過程中備份了大量的檔案\r\n會導致難以去追蹤檔案之間的差異

column17: If a serious error occurs and you have to go back to the previous versions, \r\nyou will spend a lot of time on fixing errors.
column18: 萬一在過程中遇到了嚴重的錯誤必須回到過去的版本時\r\n您需要花費很多時間去修正錯誤

column17: Second, your work environment becomes messy \r\nbecause of multiple backup files.
column18: 第二，您的工作環境會因為備份多個檔案而變得雜亂

column17: You might even encounter situations like:\n1. Developed the content on old versions of files\n2. Overwriting the current development file while backing up files.
column18: 甚至，您可能還會遇到以下情況：\r\n1. 不小心在舊版本的文件中進行專案開發\r\n2. 備份檔案時覆蓋了目前正在開發的檔案

column17: To avoid these issues, \r\nwe can use a version control system to help us manage projects.
column18: 為了避免這些問題的發生\r\n我們可以使用版本控制系統來協助管理我們的專案

column17: First, let's get to know what is version control.
column18: 首先，讓我們來了解什麼是版本控制吧

column17: Version control is one of the main roles in software development.\nBut is not limited to programming-related fields.
column18: 版本控制在程式開發領域中是重要的角色之一\r\n但它不僅僅適用於程式相關領域

column17: In fact, if there’s a project that requires long-term operation and development.\r\nIt can be effectively managed with version control.
column18: 實際上，只要是需要長期運營和開發的專案\r\n都可以透過版本控制來有效管理

column17: The main goal of version control is to better manage changes in files. \r\nIt records every modification during the development.
column18: 版本控制的主要目標是為了更好地管理檔案的變化\r\n它會記錄開發過程中的每一次修改

column17:
1. History Tracking: 
It allows you to view every change made to files, 
including who made the changes, when they were made, 
and the specific content of the changes.
column18: 1. 歷史追蹤： \r\n版本控制允許您查看檔案的每一次變化\r\n包括誰進行了修改、何時進行了修改以及具體的修改內容

column17: For example, graphic designers or web designers might modify images several times while editing.\nIn this scenario, version control can be appropriate to help people manage the images.
column18: 舉例來說，美術設計師或網頁設計師\r\n在進行圖片編輯時可能會多次修改圖片\r\n這個情況下，通過版本控制來管理圖片是非常合適的

column17: 2. Rollback Function: \r\nIf you encounter errors or need to go back to the previous version, \r\nversion control can easily return to a previous version without affecting the current development.
column18:
2. 回溯功能： 
如果您遇到錯誤、需要回到以前的版本時
版本控制可以輕鬆地返回先前的版本
不會影響到正在開發的內容

column17: 3. Branch Management: \r\nIt allows you to create branches for development, \r\nand lets different features be developed at the same time without interference.
column18:
3. 分支管理： 
版本控制允許您創建分支來進行開發
這使得不同功能的開發可以同時進行
而不會互相干擾

column17: The benefits of version control above,\r\nwe will further understand and practically operate in later stages.\r
column18: 以上版本控制的優勢\r\n在後面的關卡中會更進一步地了解並進行實際操作

column17: After understanding what version control is, let's learn about Git.
column18: 在知道什麼是版本控制後\r\n讓我們來了解什麼是 Git

column17: Git is a powerful version control tool, \r\nit’s highly popular in software development.
column18: Git 是一個非常強大的版本控制工具\r\n它在軟體開發領域非常受歡迎

column17: Users will operate version control functions through \nexecuting Git commands in the Command Line.
column18: 使用者需要通過命令行（Command Line）\r\n輸入 Git 指令來操作版本控制的相關功能

column17: Here are some advantages of using Git:
column18: 以下是使用 Git 帶來的一些優勢：

column17: 1. Team Collaboration: \r\nGit allows team members to develop a project at the same time without interfering with each other's work.\r\nAnd members can easily merge files.
column18:
1. 團隊協作：
Git 允許團隊成員同時進行專案開發
而彼此的工作不會互相干擾
同時，它也能夠輕鬆地將各成員的檔案合併在一起

column17: 2. Branch Strategy: \r\nGit's branch management feature smoothens the project development process. \r\nYou can create different branches, each focused on specific goals.
column18: 2. 分支策略： \r\nGit 的分支管理功能使專案的發展過程更加流暢\r\n您可以創建不同的分支，每個分支將專注於不同的目標

column17: Once the development branches are complete, they can be merged into the main branch.\nIt enhances project stability.
column18: 當開發分支的內容確認完成後\r\n將該分支合併到主要分支\r\n上述流程將提高專案的穩定性

column17: 3. Version Tracking: \r\nEvery file submission is recorded and stored in Git.\r\nYou can easily view each submission content.
column18: 3. 版本追蹤：\r\n每次的檔案提交都會被記錄並儲存在 Git 中\r\n您可以方便地查看每一次提交的內容

column17:
4. Easy to Learn:
Even if you are not a programmer or never touched programming,
Git's concepts are relatively simple. 
You can execute simple Git commands to control the system.
column18:
4. 容易學習： 
即使您不是程式開發人員，或者從未接觸過程式
Git 的概念其實是相對簡單的
只需要透過簡單的命令，就可以操作此系統

column17: In this game, Git commands are adjusted.\nWe will focus on practical commands and remove difficult ones.
column18: 而在本遊戲中，會對 Git 指令做調整\r\n我們將專注學習實用的指令，並移除困難的指令

column17: In conclusion, version control significantly enhances project development efficiency and organizes content management.
column18: 總結來說\r\n版本控制大幅提升了專案的開發效率\r\n並能有組織的管理內容

column17: For historical records and version tracking features,\nwe can clearly see the differences between file versions.
column18: 歷史記錄和版本追蹤功能\r\n能夠清楚地查看版本之間的差異

column17: The rollback function allows us to go back to the previous version, \r\nit helps us view historical content and fix problems.
column18: 回溯功能允許我們返回先前的歷史版本\r\n以便於查看歷史內容、修復問題

column17: The branching system increases stability and efficiency for project development.
column18: 分支系統提升了專案開發的穩定性和效率

column17: Finally, version control supports team collaboration, \r\nallowing team members to develop features together and \r\nintegrate completed content into the project.
column18: 最後，版本控制支持團隊協作\r\n團隊成員能夠共同開發功能\r\n並將完成的內容整合到專案中

column17: After understanding what version control and Git are,\nlet's have a quiz.
column18: 在了解什麼是版本控制與 Git 之後\r\n我們來進行測驗吧

column17: Here are the benefits of version control:
column18: 而以下是版本控制的好處：

column17: The developers of Git integrated the concept of version control into it.
column18: 製作 Git 的開發人員將版本控制的概念引入其中

column17: Chapter 1 - 'Review of Stage 1'

column17:
Which of the following descriptions is <color=#CF001C>not</color> a feature of version control?
A. Easy to track changes between files.
B. Requires copying files on the project for management.
C. Often used in large projects.
D. Convenient for comparing differences between versions.
column18:
以下哪個描述<color=#CF001C>不是</color>版本控制的特點？
A. 容易追蹤檔案之間的變化
B. 需要在專案上複製檔案來進行管理
C. 經常在大型專案中使用
D. 方便比較版本間的不同

column17: Question [var=Counter]
column18: 第 [var=Counter] 題

column17:
What is the main purpose of version control?
A. Analyze market demand for the project.
B. Assist developers in project development through AI.
C. Ensure that the version running without errors.
D. Manage changes between files.
column18:
版本控制的主要目的是什麼？
A. 分析專案的市場需求
B. 通過 AI 協助開發者開發專案
C. 確認版本運作沒有錯誤
D. 管理檔案之間的變化

column17:
Which of the following features of version control is <color=#CF001C>not</color> correct?
A. Branching makes development more stable and efficient.
B. The feature of history rollback helps developers solve problems.
C. Version control does not greatly improve team management.
D. Branching feature helps team development.
column18:
下列對版本控制的功能哪個是<color=#CF001C>錯誤</color>的？
A. 分支功能讓開發更穩定、有效率
B. 回溯歷史功能幫助開發者解決問題
C. 版本控制對團隊的管理效果不大
D. 分支功能幫助團隊開發

column17:
Which of the following statements about Git is correct?
A. Only software developers use Git.
B. Git increases the speed of running programs.
C. Git helps manage changes between files.
D. Git does not support team management.
column18:
下列對 Git 的敘述哪個是正確的？
A. 只有程式開發人員會使用 Git
B. Git 提升運行程式的速度
C. Git 幫助管理檔案之間的變化
D. Git 不支持團隊管理

column17: Correct!
column18: 回答正確！

column17: Correct!
column18: 回答正確！

column17: Correct!
column18: 回答正確！

column17:
For the rollback feature in version control, which statement is correct?
A. Easy to switch to different versions.
B. Switching versions will discard the content currently being developed.
C. Similar to restoring versions of backup files.
D. Will take a lot of time to switch different versions.
column18:
版本控制中的回溯功能，以下敘述哪個是正確的？
A. 容易切換到不同的版本中
B. 切換版本後，會將正在開發的內容捨棄掉
C. 和備份檔案的回復版本的方式相似
D. 切換版本會花費很多時間

column17:
In the history tracking feature of version control, which of the following is <color=#CF001C>not</color> recorded?
A. Author who created the record.
B. Modify messages in the record.
C. Time when the record is created.
D. Each file size in the record.
column18:
版本控制的歷史追蹤功能中，其中<color=#CF001C>沒有</color>哪項記錄？
A. 創建記錄的作者
B. 記錄裡的修改內容
C. 創建記錄的時間
D. 記錄中的每個文件大小

column17:
What is the relationship between version control and Git?
A. They are the same, but their name is different.
B. Git implements the concept of version control.
C. They are not closely related.
D. Git supports team development, while version control does not.
column18:
版本控制 與 Git 之間的關係是？
A. 它們是一樣的，但是名字不同
B. Git 實作了版本控制的概念
C. 兩者之間關係不大
D. Git 支持團隊開發，而版本控制不支持

column18: 恭喜您選擇了正確答案！\n讓我們繼續吧

column17: Easily tracking file changes is one of the main features of version control.
column18: 容易追蹤文件間的變化是版本控制的主要特點之一

column17: One of the purposes of version control is to\navoid tracking changes by copying files.\nIt can enhance the efficiency of project management.
column18: 版本控制的目的之一就是避免透過複製檔案來追蹤變更\n以此提升管理專案的效率

column17: Version control is often used in large projects\nto help manage more complex file content.
column18: 版本控制經常在大型專案中使用，以幫助管理更為複雜的檔案內容

column17: Comparing differences between different versions\nis one of the key features of version control.
column18: 比較不同版本間的差異是版本控制的關鍵功能之一

column17: Analyzing project market demands is not the purpose of version control.
column18: 分析專案市場需求不是版本控制的目的

column17: AI-assisted development is a different topic.\nIt is not directly related to version control.
column18: AI 輔助開發是另一個主題，與版本控制無直接關係

column17: Although version control can help confirm whether a version runs correctly.\nBut it is not its main purpose.
column18: 雖然版本控制可以幫助確認版本運作是否正確\n但這不是主要目的

column17: The main purpose of version control is to manage and record the file changes.
column18: 版本控制的核心目的是管理和記錄文件間的變化

column17: The branch feature indeed makes development more stable and efficient.
column18: 分支功能確實使開發更加穩定、有效率

column17: The history tracking feature is very useful for solving problems.
column18: 回溯歷史功能對於解決問題非常有用

column17: This description is incorrect.\nVersion control is very important for team collaboration and management.
column18: 這個描述是錯誤的\n版本控制對團隊協作和管理非常重要

column17: The branch feature indeed increases teams' collaboration development.
column18: 分支功能確實促進了團隊間的協作開發

column17: Not just software developers, but many other types of professionals also use Git.
column18: 不只是程式開發人員，許多其他類型的專業人士也使用 Git

column17: Any project that requires long-term maintenance\nand tracking of file changes can use Git for management.
column18: 只要是需要長時間維護、追蹤文件變化的專案\n都可以使用 Git 來協助管理

column17: Git is not related to improving the speed of program execution.
column18: Git 與提升運行程式的速度無關

column17: One of the main features of Git is to help manage file changes.
column18: Git 的主要功能之一就是幫助管理文件的變更

column17: Git supports and enhances team collaboration management.
column18: Git 支援並提升了團隊間的協作管理

column17: Version control systems typically allow users to easily switch to different versions.
column18: 版本控制系統通常允許使用者輕鬆切換到不同版本

column17: In most cases,\nswitching versions does not discard the content currently being developed.
column18: 在大多數情況下，切換版本時不會丟棄正在開發的內容

column17: Although similar,\nthe version rollback feature in version control\nis more flexible and powerful than traditional backup.
column18: 雖然類似，但是版本控制的回溯功能比傳統備份更加靈活、強大

column17: Switching between different versions is usually quick and does not take much time.
column18: 切換不同版本通常很快，不會花費太多時間

column17: The creator of the record is included.
column18: 創建記錄的作者有在其中

column17: The modified content of the record is included.\nWe can use it to know what changes were made in this record.
column18: 記錄裡的修改內容有在其中\n我們可以通過它來得知本次記錄做了哪些改動

column17: The time of the record creation is one of the basic information.
column18: 創建記錄的時間是基本信息之一

column17: Usually, the size of the file is not something that version control systems record.
column18: 通常，提交的檔案大小不是版本控制系統會記錄下的內容

column17: They are not exactly the same.\nGit is an implementation of the concept of version control.
column18: 它們不完全相同\nGit 是版本控制概念的一個實現

column17: Git is a tool that implements the concept of version control.
column18: Git 是實現版本控制概念的工具

column17: In fact, they are closely related.
column18: 實際上，它們是緊密相關的

column17: Git indeed supports team development,\njust like other version control systems.
column18: Git 確實支援團隊開發，就像其他版本控制系統一樣

column17: Congratulations on completing the quiz!\nWell done!
column18: 恭喜您完成測驗\r\n做的很好！

column17: With this quiz, you've reviewed the knowledge introduced in this stage.
column18: 通過這次測驗，您複習了本關卡介紹的知識

column17: Next, we will move on to the next stage,\nwhere we will start learning how to use Git.
column18: 接下來，我們將進入下一關卡\r\n開始來學習如何實際使用 Git

column17: In the upcoming stages, we will explore various Git commands,\nand operate by actually typing these commands.\nThis will help you to further improve your Git skills.
column18: 在之後的關卡中，我們將探索各種 Git 指令\r\n並通過實際輸入指令的方式來進行操作\r\n這將幫助您更好地提升 Git 技能

column17: Finally, congratulations on passing this stage.\nYou did a great job!
column18: 最後，恭喜您通過了本次的關卡\r\n您做得很棒！

column17: Welcome to the 'Basic Operations in Git Staging Area' stage!
column18: 歡迎來到\r\n'Git 暫存區域的基礎操作' 關卡！

column17: First, let's quickly review the knowledge and commands we learned in the previous stage.
column18: 首先，讓我們快速回顧上一關卡中學到的知識和指令

column17: In the last stage, \r\nwe used two Git commands: \r\n'git --version' and 'git init'.
column18: 在上一關卡中，\r\n我們使用了兩個 Git 指令：\r\n'git --version' 和 'git init'

column17: The 'git init' command is the basis for creating the Git management system.\nIt is the first command to execute when starting to use Git.
column18: git init' 作為創建 Git 管理系統的基礎\r\n是開始使用 Git 系統時需要輸入的第一個指令

column17: The '.git' folder, which was created by this command.\nIt is the core of the Git system.
column18: 執行指令後創建的 '.git' 資料夾\r\n是 Git 系統的核心

column17: We introduced what the '.git' folder is \r\nand mentioned the three important areas that are contained in Git:
column18: 之後介紹了 '.git' 資料夾是什麼\r\n並提到組成 Git 的三個重要區域

column17:
which is:
Working Directory
Staging Area
Repository
column18:
分別是：
'工作目錄' (Working Directory)
'暫存區域' (Staging Area)
'儲存庫' (Repository)

column17: In this stage, we will go further into the 'Staging Area'\nand control it with several Git commands.
column18: 在本次關卡中，將進一步介紹 '暫存區域'\r\n並通過幾個 Git 指令來與它互動

column13: CloseImageWindow();\nBlackPanelControl(false);\nFSMEvent("Stage Manager/Load Default Background Story", "Stage Manager Parent", "Background Controller");
column17: Next, let's simulate the background story for this stage.
column18: 接下來，讓我們先來模擬本次的遊戲背景

column17: After setting up the simulation, \r\nwe'll review the use of the 'Staging Area'.
column18: 在完成模擬後\r\n我們先回顧 '暫存區域' 的作用

column17: The 'Staging Area' plays an important role in the Git system, \r\nIt acts as a bridge between the 'Working Directory' and the 'Repository'.
column18: 暫存區域' 在 Git 系統中扮演了重要的角色\r\n它作為 '工作目錄' 和 '儲存庫' 之間的橋樑

column17: After modifying files in the 'Working Directory', \r\nyou move them to the 'Staging Area' using Git commands.
column18: 在 '工作目錄' 中修改檔案內容後\r\n通過 Git 指令將檔案移動至 '暫存區域' 中

column17: Once you moved all the changes, \r\nwe'll use another Git command to store all the modifications in the 'Repository'.
column18: 在確定好修改內容後\r\n我們會通過另一個 Git 指令將所有修改內容存入 '儲存庫' 中

column17: The 'Repository' combines them into a record known as a 'commit', \r\nit means we create a new version.
column18: 儲存庫' 會把它們整合成一次記錄\r\n這個記錄稱為 '提交'，表示我們創建了一個新版本

column17: However, we can't directly see the 'Staging Area' and 'Repository' in the 'File Manager' window.\nThey need to be viewed through Git commands.
column18: 但是，我們無法直接在 '檔案管理' 視窗中\r\n看到 '暫存區域' 和 '儲存庫' 這兩個區域\r\n需要通過 Git 指令來查看它們

column17: Now, let's learn how to open the 'Staging Area'.\nWe'll use the 'Command Line' window to execute commands for this purpose.
column18: 接下來，讓我們來學習如何打開 '暫存區域'\r\n本次也需要使用 '命令行' 視窗來執行指令

column7: (新增任務)/(解鎖按鈕 - 命令行)
column13: FSMEvent("Quest Tracker/Add New Quest", "Quest Tracker Parent", "Quest Tracker");\nVariable["UnlockButtonKey"] = "CommandLine"\nFSMEvent("Dialogue System/WindowToolbar/Unlock Button", "WindowToolbar", "Panel");
column17: Now, please open the 'Command Line' window first.
column18: 那麼，請您先打開 '命令行' 視窗吧

column17: Great, you've opened the 'Command Line' window.
column18: 好的，您已開啟 '命令行' 視窗

column17: In this stage,\nthe first command we need to learn is '<color=#CF001C>git status</color>'.
column18: 在這個關卡中，\r\n要學習的第一個指令是 '<color=#CF001C>git status</color>'

column17: This command displays the contents of the 'Staging Area' in the 'Command Line' window.
column18: 通過這個指令\r\nGit 會將 '暫存區域' 中的內容\r\n顯示在 '命令行' 視窗上

column17: In this game, \r\nto let you view the output clearly and easily, \r\nthe output has been separated into the window — the 'Staging Area' window.
column18: 在本遊戲裡，\r\n為了讓您能以簡潔便利的方式觀看輸出內容\r\n輸出結果獨立成了視窗 —— '暫存區域' 視窗

column7: 解鎖手冊gitstatus1&(新增任務)&高亮CommandLine視窗&顯示Hint_CommandLineWindow
column17: Next, please execute the '<color=#CF001C>git status</color>' command\nto view the contents of the 'Staging Area'.
column18: 接下來，請您執行 '<color=#CF001C>git status</color>' 指令\r\n來查看 '暫存區域' 的內容

column17: Great job!\nYou have successfully executed the 'git status' command.
column18: 很好！\r\n您已成功執行 'git status' 指令

column17: After execution, the 'Staging Area' window appeared on the screen.\nLet's understand the contents of it.
column18: 執行後，'暫存區域' 視窗顯示在了畫面上\r\n我們來了解視窗中的內容吧

column17: In this window, it shows the file differences \r\nbetween the 'Working Directory' and the 'Staging Area'.
column18: 在這個視窗中\r\n顯示了 '工作目錄' 與 '暫存區域' 檔案之間的差異

column17: In the 'Unstaged Files' area, \r\nyou'll find files that have been added, modified, or deleted in the 'Working Directory'.
column18: 在 '未追蹤' (Unstaged Files) 區域中\r\n是我們在 '工作目錄' 裡新增、修改、刪除的檔案

column17: These files are seen as 'untracked' by the Git system\nwhen the content has been '<color=#CF001C>changed</color>' but not moved to the 'Staging Area' yet.
column18: 當這些檔案在 '<color=#CF001C>變更</color>' 後\r\n但還沒有放入 '暫存區域' 時\r\nGit 系統將會視它們為 '未追蹤' 檔案

column17: Also, the plus icon is in the first line of the list.\nThis means the file 'Class_Notes.txt' is being tracked for the first time for the Git management system,
column18: 此外，列表第一行的加號圖示\r\n表示 '課堂筆記.txt' 對於 Git 管理系統來說\r\n是第一次被追蹤

column17: The 'Staged Files' area represents the files we've added to the 'Staging Area'.\nThey are ready to save as a record.
column18: 而 '已追蹤' (Staged Files) 區域\r\n表示我們加入到 '暫存區域' 的檔案\r\n它們準備要儲存成一份記錄

column17: After confirming all the files we want to record, \r\nwe can move the 'Staged' content to the 'Repository' at once to create a 'commit'.
column18: 在我們確認好所有要記錄的檔案後\r\n就可以一次性地將 '已追蹤' 的內容放到 '儲存庫' 中 \r\n這些內容將創建為一份 '提交'（記錄）

column17: After we understand the structure of the 'Staging Area', \r\nlet's try to add files to it. \r\nWe'll use the command '<color=#CF001C>git add</color>' to achieve this.
column18: 了解完 '暫存區域' 的結構後\r\n來試著將檔案加入到 '已追蹤' 吧\r\n我們要通過指令 '<color=#CF001C>git add</color>' 來達成目標

column17: In the 'git add' command, \r\nyou need to include the filename you want to upload.
column18: 在 'git add' 指令中\r\n您需要在指令前方加入想要上傳的文件名稱

column17: There's a file on the computer.\nWe can add it using '<color=#CF001C>git add Class_Notes.txt</color>'.
column18: 本次電腦中有一份文件\r\n我們可以使用 '<color=#CF001C>git add 課堂筆記.txt</color>'\r\n加入到 '已追蹤'

column17: Before we start, \r\nlet me introduce another feature in the 'Command Line' window.

column17: The search function of the 'Command Line' window, \r\nit can also fill in the file name in the input field quickly.

column17: To use this feature, please follow these steps:

column17: 1. Enter '<color=#CF001C>git add</color>' in the input field.
column18: 第 1 步：\r\n在輸入欄中輸入 '<color=#CF001C>git add</color>'

column17: 2. Add a space after the command, become:\n'<color=#CF001C>git add </color>'.
column18: 第 2 步：\r\n在指令前方加一個空格\r\n變成 '<color=#CF001C>git add </color>'

column17: 3. Press the search feature button or the Tab key. \r\nThe system will display all file names in the current path.\r\nChoose the file you want to add.
column18:
第 3 步：
按下搜尋功能按鈕或 Tab 鍵
系統會顯示當前路徑下的所有檔案名稱
從中選擇要加入的檔案

column17: Next, let's understand how Git determines whether a file should be tracked.

column7: 高亮stagingArea視窗&高亮FileManager視窗&顯示Hint_FileManagerWindow&不顯示Hint_UnstagedFiles
column17: First, let's start with 'Folder A'. \r\nIt doesn't have files.
column18: 首先，從 '資料夾A' 開始\r\n資料夾中沒有任何檔案

column17: Git's primary purpose is to track and manage files, \r\nso it doesn't need to track an empty folder.
column18: Git 主要目的是追蹤和管理檔案\r\n所以 Git 不需要追蹤它

column17: Next is 'Folder B', which contains other untracked files.
column18: 接下來是 '資料夾B'\r\n資料夾裡面含有其他未追蹤的檔案

column17: When there are no tracked files in 'Folder B', \r\nit is simply displayed as 'Folder B'.
column18: 當 '資料夾B' 裡面沒有任何被追蹤的檔案時\r\n就會簡單顯示為 '資料夾B'

column17: The final, file 'File C.txt'. \r\nAccording to Git's default rules,\r\nall '<color=#CF001C>non-folder type</color>' files will be tracked.
column18: 最後，'文件C.txt' 檔案\r\n在 Git 默認規則下\r\n所有 '<color=#CF001C>非資料夾類型</color>' 的檔案都會被追蹤

column17: After understanding how Git tracks files,\nlet's move on to learning about Git commands.
column18: 在了解 Git 追蹤檔案的規則後\r\n讓我們開始進入學習 Git 指令的部分吧

column17: The 'git add' and 'git reset' commands we learned in the previous stage.\nThey are not only can add '<color=#CF001C>target file name</color>', but also add '<color=#CF001C>folder name</color>'.
column18: 我們在前一關卡學習的 'git add'、'git reset' 指令\r\n它們不只可以加入 '<color=#CF001C>指定檔案名稱</color>'\r\n還可以加入 '<color=#CF001C>資料夾名稱</color>'

column17: This is the high flexibility of Git commands.\nMost commands can include additional parameters to achieve different functions.
column18: 這是 Git 指令的高靈活性\r\n大部分的指令都可以加入其他參數\r\n來實現不同的功能

column17: To help you effectively learn these commands.\nThis game will focus on the key Git commands.\nYou only need to learn the commands mentioned in the stage.

column17: In this stage, we successfully added the modified file content to 'Staged'.
column18: 在本次關卡中，我們已經成功地\r\n將修改好的檔案內容加入至 '已追蹤'

column17: Now, it's time to move the changes to the 'Repository'.
column18: 現在，是時候將修改移動到 '儲存庫' (Repository) 中了

column17: In the next stage, we will submit the first version of the project.\nThen understand the structure inside the 'Repository'.
column18: 在下一關卡\r\n我們將會正式提交專案的第一個版本\r\n並且認識 '儲存庫' 裡面的結構

column17: Finally, congratulations on completing this stage.\nYou did a great job!
column18: 最後，恭喜您完成本次的關卡\r\n您做的很好！

column17: Welcome to the 'Creating Your First Git Project Version' stage!
column18: 歡迎來到\n'創建您的第一個 Git 專案版本' 關卡！

column17: In this stage, you will learn how to create the first version of your Git project.
column18: 在這個關卡中\n您將學習如何創建您的第一個 Git 專案版本

column17: First, let's quickly review the knowledge and commands we learned in the last stage.
column18: 首先，讓我們快速回顧上一關卡中學到的知識和指令

column17: In the previous stage, we further understood the structure of the 'Staging Area'.\nAnd learned the advanced usage of 'git add' and 'git reset'.
column18: 在上一個關卡中，我們進一步瞭解了 '暫存區域' 的結構\n並學習 'git add' 和 'git reset' 的進階用法

column17: By adding a 'folder_name' or '.' symbol before the command,\nwe can move files into or out of the 'Staging Area' effectively.
column18: 在指令前方加入 '資料夾名稱' 或 '.' 符號\n來更有效地將檔案移入或移出 '暫存區域'

column17: After reviewing the content of the previous stage,\nlet's start this tutorial.
column18: 在回顧完上一個關卡的內容後\n讓我們開始本次的教學

column17: We also need to prepare a midterm report for the course.\nBut this time, we will use the Git system to manage it.
column18: 這次也需要準備課程期中報告\n但是，本次要使用 Git 系統來管理它

column17: After creating the Git management system,\nthe 'Repository' is initially without any records.
column18: 在創建 Git 管理系統後\n'儲存庫' 的內容在初始狀態下是沒有記錄的

column17: Therefore, in the first version.\nWe need to add the files to be managed into the 'Repository'.
column18: 因此，我們創建的第一個版本\n都是將需要管理的檔案新增至 '儲存庫' 中

column13: ShowImage("crossing");\nFSMEvent("Quest Tracker/Add New Quest", "Quest Tracker Parent", "Quest Tracker");
column17: Next, to manage the midterm report with Git.\nPlease add the file to the 'Staging Area' first.
column18: 接下來，為了讓期中報告能夠通過 Git 進行管理\n請您先將檔案加入 '暫存區域' 吧

column17: Once you added the file to 'Staged',\nit's ready to be pushed the changed to the 'Repository'.
column18: 當檔案加入至 '已追蹤' 後\n就可以準備將修改推送到 '儲存庫' 中了

column17: Excellent! You have successfully added the presentation to the 'Staging Area'.
column18: 非常好！\n您已成功將簡報推送到 '暫存區域' 中

column17: After confirming the content to be committed,\nnext, we will execute a new command to move the content from the 'Staging Area' to the 'Repository'.\nThese contents will be saved as the first version of the report.
column18:
在確定好要提交的內容後
接下來，我們來執行一個新的指令
讓 '暫存區域' 的內容移動到 '儲存庫'
這些內容將保存為第一個報告版本

column17: The command is '<color=#CF001C>git commit -m</color>'.\nLet's understand the structure of this command.
column18: 這個指令是 '<color=#CF001C>git commit -m</color>'\n讓我們來了解這個指令的結構

column17: The 'git commit' command will save the contents of the 'Staging Area'\nas a new version and record it in the 'Repository'.
column18: git commit' 指令\n會將 '暫存區域' 的內容保存為一個新的版本\n並將其記錄到 '儲存庫' 中

column17: The '-m' (Message) shows that\nwe can add a commit message before the command.
column18: 而 '-m'（Message 訊息）表示我們可以\n在指令的前方加入提交訊息

column17: Before submitting the new version,\nwe must fill in a commit message for these changes.
column18: 在提交新版本之前\n我們必須為本次的修改內容填入一個提交訊息

column17: When writing a commit message,\nit is important to ensure the content is <color=#CF001C>clear, concise, and meaningful</color>.\nThis helps others understand the purpose and content of the file changes.
column18: 在填寫提交訊息時，也需要注意填入的內容\n<color=#CF001C>清晰、簡潔、有意義</color>的提交訊息\n能讓人更好地理解檔案變更的內容和目的

column17: In this game, when executing the 'git commit -m' command,\nthe system asks you to choose the most suitable message from the options.
column18: 在本遊戲執行 'git commit -m' 指令時\n系統會要求您從選項中選擇最適合的訊息

column17: To use this command in the game,\nplease follow these steps:
column18: 如果要在遊戲中使用這個指令\n請按照以下步驟來操作：

column17: 1. Enter '<color=#CF001C>git commit -m</color>' in the input field.
column18: 第 1 步：\n在輸入欄中輸入 '<color=#CF001C>git commit -m</color>'

column17: 2. Add a space after '-m', become:\n'<color=#CF001C>git commit -m </color>'.
column18: 第 2 步：\n在指令前方加入一個空格\n變成 '<color=#CF001C>git commit -m </color>'

column17: 3. Since Git commands are separated by spaces,\nenclose the commit message in quotation <color=#CF001C>"</color> when writing it.\nIt should look like: '<color=#CF001C>git commit -m ""</color>'
column18:
第 3 步：
由於 Git 指令是按照空格區分不同的部分
所以在填寫提交訊息時
需要通過 <color=#CF001C>"</color> 符號將訊息括起來
變成：「<color=#CF001C>git commit -m ""</color>」

column17: 4. In this game, you don't need to enter the commit message manually.\nAfter completing the previous step, press the Tab key or the search button to open the commit message options.\nSelect the most appropriate commit message from there.
column18:
第 4 步：
在本遊戲中，您不需要手動輸入提交訊息
完成上一步後，按下 Tab 鍵或搜尋功能按鈕
來開啟提交訊息選項
從中<color=#CF001C>選擇一個最合適的提交訊息</color>

column17: 5. After selection, the content in the input field should be:\n'<color=#CF001C>git commit -m "Selected_commit_message"</color>'.
column18: 第 5 步：\n選擇完後，輸入欄中的內容應該是：\n<color=#CF001C>git commit -m "選擇的提交訊息"</color>

column17: Alright, after opening the 'Staging Area' window,\nyou will notice that the 'Midterm_Report.ppt' file does not appear in\neither the 'Unstaged' or 'Staged' areas.
column18: 好的，在開啟 '暫存區域' 視窗後\n您會注意到 '期中報告.ppt' 檔案\n並未出現在 '未追蹤' 和 '已追蹤' 區域中

column17: This shows that you have successfully created the first version of it.
column18: 這表示您已成功創建 '期中報告.ppt' 的第一個版本

column17: When the Git system compares the file differences between the 'Working Directory' and the 'First Commit Version',\nit does not find any changes in the report content.
column18: 當 Git 系統比較\n'工作目錄' 與 '第一個提交版本' 的檔案差異時\n並未發現報告內容有改變

column17: Therefore, the 'Staging Area' currently contains no tracked files.
column18: 因此 '暫存區域' 目前不包含任何被追蹤的檔案

column17: Next, we will learn how to check the commit status of versions.
column18: 接下來，我們將學習如何確認版本的提交狀況

column17: In the 'Repository', there is an area specifically for storing 'Commit History'.\nWe can view the contents of this area through commands.
column18: 在 '儲存庫' 中\n有一個專門儲存 '提交記錄' 的區域\n我們可以通過指令來查看區域中的內容

column17: Using the '<color=#CF001C>git log</color>' command will display all version records in the 'Repository',\nand the output results will be shown in the 'Command Line' window.
column18: 通過 '<color=#CF001C>git log</color>' 指令\n將顯示 '儲存庫' 中的所有版本記錄\n輸出結果會顯示在 '命令行' 視窗中

column17: However, just like with 'git status',\nthis game has made the output of the 'git log' command\ninto a separate window — the 'Commit History' window.
column18: 不過，就和 'git status' 一樣\n本遊戲將 'git log' 指令的輸出結果\n獨立成一個視窗 — '提交記錄' 視窗

column7: 解鎖手冊gitlog1&高亮粒子 手冊&圖片book
column17: For more information about the 'git log' command,\nyou can refer to the game manual.
column18: 關於 'git log' 指令的介紹\n您可以查看遊戲手冊來獲得更多資訊

column13: ShowImage("cmd");\nFSMEvent("Quest Tracker/Add New Quest", "Quest Tracker Parent", "Quest Tracker");
column17: Next, please open the 'Commit History' window\nusing the '<color=#CF001C>git log</color>' command.
column18: 接下來，請您通過 '<color=#CF001C>git log</color>' 指令\n開啟 '提交記錄' 視窗吧

column17: Great!\nYou successfully opened the 'Commit History' window with the 'git log' command.
column18: 很好！\n您通過 'git log' 指令成功開啟 '提交記錄' 視窗

column17: Now, let's take a look at the contents of it.
column18: 接下來，讓我們來查看 '提交記錄' 裡的內容

column17: First, you will notice a circle icon in the window.\nIt represents the first version we created from the 'Staging Area'.
column18: 首先，您會注意到視窗中有一個圓形圖示\n它代表著我們從 '暫存區域' 中創建的第一個版本

column17: In the Git system, these versions are known as 'commits'.
column18: 在 Git 系統裡，\n這些版本稱為 '提交' (Commit)

column17: You can click on the circle icon of the 'commit' to view its detailed contents.
column18: 您可以點擊 '提交' 圓形圖示\n來查看 '提交' 的詳細內容

column17: In the pop-up window, you will see information about the commit.\nIncluding the date, author, and the message you entered earlier.\nThis information helps you understand the changes made in this 'commit'.
column18: 在彈出的彈窗中\n顯示著提交的日期、作者、以及剛才填入的訊息\n這些資訊有助於您理解這個 '提交' 做的變更

column17: Next, in the branch field,\nyou will see 'HEAD -> master'.\nThis line shows which branch the 'commit' belongs to.
column18: 接著，在分支欄位中\n您會看到 'HEAD -> master'\n這行顯示 '提交' 屬於哪個分支

column17: master' is the default branch in the Git system.\nUsually, we make commits on the 'master' branch.
column18: master' 是 Git 系統中的默認分支\n在通常情況下，我們會在 'master' 分支上進行提交

column17: In the 'Git Basics' theme stage,\nwe will only use the 'master' branch.
column18: 在 'Git 的基礎' 主題關卡中\n我們只會使用 'master' 分支

column17: Concepts about branches will be further introduced\nin the next theme stage — 'Branch Management'.
column18: 關於其他分支知識\n將在下一個主題關卡 — '分支管理' 中進一步介紹

column17: Next, let's understand what 'HEAD' is.
column18: 接下來，讓我們來了解什麼是 'HEAD'

column17: Please use the left mouse button to click on\nany area of the 'Commit History' window to close the pop-up.
column18: 請使用滑鼠左鍵\n點擊 '提交記錄' 視窗的任意區域以關閉彈窗

column17: In the left-side list of the 'Commit History' window,\nyou can see all branch names and corresponding icons in the current 'Repository'.
column18: 在 '提交記錄' 視窗的左側列表中\n能夠看到當前 '儲存庫' 所有分支名稱和對應的圖標

column17: Branches are represented in different colors.\nFor example, commits belonging to the 'master' branch\nare displayed with a blue circle and an 'M' letter icon.
column18: 分支會以不同的顏色表示\n例如：屬於 'master' 分支的 '提交'\n將以藍色圓圈和一個 M 字母組成

column17: The flag icon means that HEAD is on which 'commit' now.
column18: 旗子圖示的 HEAD\n表示目前位於哪一個 '提交'

column17: When there are multiple versions of a project,\nyou can use commands to switch between different versions.
column18: 當專案有多個版本時\n就可以使用指令來切換不同的版本

column17: Now, please use the 'git commit -m' command again\nto create the second version of the presentation.
column18: 接下來，請您再次使用 'git commit -m' 指令\n創建簡報的第二個版本吧

column17: However, to successfully create a 'commit',\nthe file needs to be modified and added to the 'Staging Area'\nbefore you create a second commit.
column18: 不過，想要成功創建 '提交'\n檔案需要被修改，加入至 '暫存區域' 後\n才能夠再次新增第二個提交

column17: The Git system compared the file differences between the 'Working Directory' and the 'First Commit Version'.\nAnd noticed a difference in the content of 'Midterm_Report.ppt'.

column17: Now, to ensure that our operations are correct,\nplease check the status of the 'Staging Area' again.

column17: In actual work,\nconfirming the status of the 'Staging Area' and 'Commit History' might not always be necessary.\nBut checking the status after executing commands is a good habit.

column13: ShowImage("cmd");\nFSMEvent("Quest Tracker/Add New Quest", "Quest Tracker Parent", "Quest Tracker");
column17: Next, please use the 'git log' command\nto see what changes have occurred in the 'Commit History' window after adding the second 'commit'.
column18: 接下來，請您使用 'git log' 指令\n來觀看新增第二個 '提交' 後\n'提交記錄' 視窗有了什麼樣的變化吧

column17: Great!\nAfter executing the command,\nthe content in the 'Commit History' window has been updated.
column18: 非常好！\n執行指令後，'提交記錄' 視窗的內容更新了

column17: Another 'commit' has been added to the area,\nand it connected to the first 'commit'.
column18: 在區域中又新增了一個 '提交'\n它與第一個 '提交' 連接在一起

column17: In the Git system, the 'Commit History' is like a timeline.\nEach commit is a mark on this timeline.
column18: 在 Git 系統中，\n'提交記錄' 就像一個時間軸\n每個提交是在時間軸上留下的一個記錄

column17: The newest 'commit' is at the top of the timeline,\nwhile the earliest 'commit' is at the bottom.
column18: 最新的 '提交' 位於時間軸的頂部\n而最早的 '提交' 位於底部

column17: The connections between 'commits' show the relationships between them.
column18: 提交' 之間的連線\n顯示了 '提交' 間的關係

column17: By viewing the 'Commit History',\nyou can better understand how the Git system records the differences between versions.
column18: 查看 '提交記錄'，\n您可以更好地理解 Git 系統\n是如何記錄版本間的不同

column13: FSMEvent("Quest Tracker/Add New Quest", "Quest Tracker Parent", "Quest Tracker");\nShowImage("timePlus")
column17: Now, please create a third 'commit' on your own!\nThis will practice the process of 'creating commits'.\nGood luck!
column18: 接下來，請您自行創建第三個 '提交' 吧！\n藉此來練習 '新增提交' 的流程\n請加油！

column17: Excellent!\nYou have added a third 'commit'\nand confirmed the status of the 'Staging Area' and 'Commit History'.
column18: 非常出色！\n您新增了第三個 '提交'\n並確認了 '暫存區域' 和 '提交記錄' 的狀態

column17: I believe that the practice at this stage\nhas increased your understanding of the creating commits process.
column18: 相信通過本次關卡的練習\n加深了 '新建提交' 的流程

column17: In this stage, we used the 'git commit -m' command\nto move files from the 'Staging Area' to the 'Repository'.

column17: After completing this stage,\nyou are now ready to start using Git commands to manage projects in development!
column18: 完成本次的關卡後\n您已經可以正式開始\n使用 Git 指令來管理開發中的專案了！

column17: In this stage,\nwe will use the command '<color=#CF001C>git checkout</color>' to move HEAD to another commit.
column18: 在本次關卡中，\n我們要使用指令 '<color=#CF001C>git checkout</color>'\n將 HEAD 移動到其他提交上

column17: Just like 'git add' and 'git reset',\nwe need to add parameters in front of the 'git checkout' command.
column18: 就和 'git add' 與 'git reset' 一樣\n需要在 'git checkout' 指令前方加上參數

column17: By adding a specific 'commit ID' in front of the command.\nIt becomes: '<color=#CF001C>git checkout commit_ID</color>'.\nThe command moves HEAD to the targeted commit.
column18: 通過在指令前方加入指定的 '提交ID'\n變成：'<color=#CF001C>git checkout 提交ID</color>'\n讓 HEAD 移動到指定的提交上

column17: In the Git system,\neach commit is assigned a unique ID while creating.
column18: 在 Git 系統中\n每一個提交在創建時都會被賦予一個獨立的 ID

column17: To know their IDs, we can use the 'git log' command to view them.
column18: 如果需要得知它們的 ID\n可以通過 'git log' 指令來查看

column17: Next, please follow these steps to learn how to get the commit ID:
column18: 接下來，請您跟著以下步驟\n來學習如何查看提交的 ID 吧

column17: First, you need to open the 'Commit History' window by Git command.
column18: 一開始，您需要先通過指令來開啟 '提交記錄' 視窗

column17: Then, click on the commit you want to move to.\nSince we want to check if the 'orange' text is appropriate,\nplease click on the 2nd commit.
column18: 接著，點擊您想要移動的提交\n本次想要查看 '橙色' 的文字是否合適\n所以請您點擊第 2 個提交

column17: In the popup window, you will see the commit ID.\n(for example: abc123)
column18: 在彈窗中，\n您可以看見詳細訊息裡出現了提交 ID\n(例如：abc123)

column17: Now, we can enter the command '<color=#CF001C>git checkout abc123</color>'\nin the 'Command Line' window to move HEAD to the specified commit.
column18: 那麼，我們就可以在 '命令行' 視窗裡\n輸入 '<color=#CF001C>git checkout abc123</color>' 指令\n來移動 HEAD 到指定提交了

column17: In the current path of the command line,\nyou can move your mouse to the branch icon on the right.\nIt helps you confirm where the current 'commit' or 'branch' is located.

column17: Alright, after updating the content of the 'Commit History' window,\nyou can see that HEAD has moved to the 2nd commit.
column18: 好的，更新了 '提交記錄' 視窗的內容後\n您可以看到 HEAD 移動到了第 2 個提交中

column17: After HEAD moves,\nthe files in the 'Working Directory' will also revert to the content of that commit.

column17: This time, please move HEAD to the 3rd commit.\nTo compare again which color, 'blue' or 'orange', is more suitable.
column18: 這次請將 HEAD 移動到第 3 個提交\n再次比較 '藍色' 文字和 '橙色' 文字哪個合適

column17: Great job! HEAD has now moved to the 3rd commit.
column18: 非常好！\nHEAD 已經移動到第 3 個提交中

column17: After comparing which text color is more suitable,\nwe have decided to use 'orange', which is the 2nd commit.
column18: 在比對了兩個顏色文字哪個合適後\n最後我們決定使用 '橙色'\n也就是第 2 個提交

column17: Therefore, we decide to move to the 2nd commit.\nThen continue developing the project.
column18: 於是，我們決定移動到第 2 個提交上\n然後繼續開發專案

column17: However, in this situation,\nit's not possible to continue developing the project.
column18: 然而，在這種情況下\n這樣是無法繼續開發專案的

column17: Now, let's understand the problem we are currently facing.
column18: 接下來，讓我們來了解當前遇到的問題

column17: Look at the branch list.\nYou will find the 'Detached' keyword has been added to the HEAD.\nAnd all commits in the field are transparent.
column18: 查看分支列表，會發現 HEAD 後方增加了 '分離' 的關鍵字。\n並且畫面中的提交都是透明的。

column17: In the Git system,\nthis condition is known as '<color=#CF001C>Detached HEAD</color>'.\nIt means the current HEAD is not pointing to any branch.
column18: 在 Git 系統中\n這種情況稱為<color=#CF001C>分離 HEAD</color> (Detached HEAD)\n表示當前 HEAD 並沒有指到任何的分支

column17: When executing 'git checkout commit ID',\nHEAD points to the specified commit.\nIt leads to a '<color=#CF001C>Detached HEAD</color>' situation.
column18: 在執行 'git checkout 提交ID' 時\nHEAD 會指向您指定的提交\n導致<color=#CF001C>分離 HEAD</color>的發生

column17: Although HEAD points to the 3rd commit,\nwhich is also the latest commit in the 'master' branch.\nBut HEAD is not actually pointing to the 'master' branch.
column18: 雖然 HEAD 指向了第 3 個提交\n它也是 'master' 分支裡最新的提交\n然而實際上，HEAD 並沒有指向 'master' 分支

column17: After clicking on this commit,\nyou will find that the branch field is no longer 'HEAD -> master'.
column18: 點擊這個提交後\n會發現在分支欄位已不再是 'HEAD -> master'

column17: In this situation, even if we create a new commit,\nit will not create the 4th commit on the 'master' branch.
column18: 在這種情況下\n就算我們新建一個提交\n也不會在 'master' 分支上創建第 4 個提交

column17: Also, the commits you create in a Detached HEAD state.\nIt could even be at risk of being lost.
column18: 同時，您在分離 HEAD 情況下創建的提交\n甚至會有遺失的風險

column17: So please be aware, after you finish reviewing the content of other commits.\n<color=#CF001C>Remember to switch back to the branch you wish to continue developing on!</color>
column18: 所以請注意，當我們查看完其他提交的內容後\n<color=#CF001C>請記得切換回您想要繼續開發的分支！</color>

column17: The last command to learn in this stage is '<color=#CF001C>git checkout branch_name</color>'.\nWith this command, you can move HEAD back to a branch.
column18: 本關卡要學習的最後一個指令是\n'<color=#CF001C>git checkout 分支名稱</color>'\n通過這個指令，您就可以將 HEAD 移動回分支上了

column18: 試試看在命令行中輸入：'<color=#CF001C>git checkout master</color>'\n讓 HEAD 移動回 'master' 分支吧\n請加油！

column17: Excellent!\nAfter executing the 'git checkout master' command,\nthe command line returned a success message.
column18: 非常好！\n執行 'git checkout master' 指令後\n'命令行' 回傳了成功訊息

column17: Looking at the 'Commit History' window,\nHEAD is no longer transparent and is located on the 3rd commit.
column18: 查看 '提交記錄' 視窗，\n發現 HEAD 不再透明，並位於第 3 個提交上

column17: After clicking on this commit,\nyou'll see that the text in the branch field has returned to 'HEAD -> master'.\nIt shows that HEAD is now pointing to the 'master' branch.
column18: 點擊這個提交後\n發現在分支欄位中的文字變回了 'HEAD -> master'\n表示 HEAD 正指向 'master' 分支

column17: After we decided to set the text color to orange,\nwe modified the content of 'Web_Stylesheet.css' and created the 4th commit right away.

column17: Based on the practice and operations in this stage,\nwe have successfully achieved the stage goal.
column18: 根據本次的練習和操作\n我們順利地完成了這次的關卡目標

column17: In this stage, we learned two ways to switch versions:
column18: 本次關卡學會了兩種方式去切換不同的版本

column17: git checkout commit_ID' is used to move to a specified commit.\nThis command is used to view the contents of different versions.
column18: git checkout 提交ID' 用於移動至指定的提交\n通過這個指令來查看不同版本的內容

column17: git checkout branch_name' is used to move to a specified branch.\nThis command is used when a Detached HEAD situation occurs\nor when you want to continue developing on a branch.
column18: git checkout 分支名稱' 則用於移動到指定的分支上\n在分離 HEAD 的情形發生時，或是想要繼續在分支上開發時\n會使用的指令

column17: Finally, congratulations on passing this stage!\nThis also means you have completed the 'Git Basics' theme stage.\nYou did a great job!
column18: 最後，恭喜您通過了本次關卡！\n這也代表您完成了 'Git 基礎' 主題關卡\n您做得很棒！

column17: Welcome to the 'Git Branching Basics Tutorial' stage!
column18: 歡迎來到\n'Git 分支基礎教學' 關卡！

column17: In the 'Branch Management' theme stage,\nwe will learn about Git's branch system.\nAnd achieve the goals of the simulated scenario through commands and windows.
column18: 在 '分支管理' 主題關卡中\n我們將學習 Git 的分支系統\n並通過指令、視窗來達成模擬場景的目標

column17: First, let's review the advantages of the branch system for project management.
column18: 首先，來回顧分支系統對專案管理有什麼優點

column17: Branches in Git are a powerful and practical feature.\nWe can create branches with different names and purposes.
column18: Git 中的分支是一個強大且實用的功能\n我們可以創建多個不同名稱和用途的分支

column17: For example, use 'Branch A' to develop new features,\n'Branch B' to fix errors in the project,\nand the main branch (master) to wait for other branches to achieve their goals.
column18: 例如，'分支A' 來開發新功能\n'分支B' 來修復專案上的錯誤\n主分支（master）則等待其他分支完成目標

column17: When a team collaborates on a project,\nthese branches can be assigned to different team members.
column18: 當團隊共同開發專案時\n可以將這些分支分配給其他人

column17: The branch environment provides an independent development workspace,\nwhere branches do not interfere with each other.
column18: 分支環境提供了獨立開發工作的環境，\n分支間不會互相干擾

column17: Even if 'Branch A' causes problems in the project,\nwe only need to delete or modify 'Branch A'.\nThe 'master' branch will not be affected.
column18: 即使 '分支A' 中導致專案出現問題\n只需要刪除或修改 '分支A' 就可以\n'master' 分支不會受到影響

column17: The branch system brings flexibility and stability to project management.
column18: 分支系統為專案管理\n帶來了靈活性和穩定性

column17: Third Commit:\nThe author fixed the errors.\nAfter multiple tests, the game runs smoothly.

column17: From these commits,\nthe author has completed the basic functions of the Tetris game.
column18: 藉由這些提交可知\n作者已經完成了俄羅斯方塊遊戲的基本功能

column17: According to the background story,\nthe author now wants to add interesting features to the game.\nBut needs to ensure that the current version is not disturbed by the features during the development.
column18: 根據背景故事\n作者接下來想要在遊戲中新增有趣的功能\n但同時需要確保現在的版本不會被正在開發的功能干擾

column17: Therefore, in this stage, we will use Git's branch feature for project development.\nWe need to create a new branch to develop new features.
column18: 因此，本次要通過 Git 的分支功能來開發專案\n我們需要新建一個分支來開發新功能

column17: The first command we learn in this stage is:\n'<color=#CF001C>git branch branch-name</color>'.\n'branch-name' is the name we will give to the new branch.
column18: 本關卡要學習的第一個指令是\n'<color=#CF001C>git branch 分支名稱</color>'\n'分支名稱' 是我們創建新分支要被命名的名稱

column17: This command will create a new branch at the commit where HEAD is pointing.\nThe branch will include this commit and all previous commits.
column18: 這個指令會在 HEAD 指向的提交創建新的分支\n並包含 HEAD 的提交以及之前的所有提交

column17: For example, if we create a new branch at the second commit,\nthis branch's 'Commit History' will include the first two commits.
column18: 例如，我們在第 2 個提交上創建新的分支\n這個分支的 '提交記錄' 會包含前面兩個提交\n也就是第 1 和 第 2 個提交

column17: However, there are some rules to follow when creating a new branch,\nwhich can help better manage the project:
column18: 不過，創建新分支時需要遵守一些規則\n這些規則可以更好地管理專案

column17: 1. The naming of the branch should be concise and clear:\nLike commit messages,\nclear naming helps people understand the purpose and features of the branch.
column18: 1. 分支的命名要簡潔、明確\n和提交訊息一樣\n清晰的命名可以讓人了解分支的目的和作用

column17:
2. Avoid using special symbols or other language characters:
The branch name should avoid these characters.
This ensures that the project can be developed on devices with different languages.
And make it easier for the team to understand the branch's purpose.
column18:
2. 避免使用特殊符號、中文
分支名稱盡量不要使用這些文字
以確保專案能夠在不同語言的設備上開發
也讓團隊理解分支的作用

column17: These are the two most important rules when creating a new branch.\nPlease create a branch while following these rules.
column18: 以上是創建新分支時最重要的兩個規則\n請在遵守規則的情況下創建分支吧

column7: 高亮粒子 手冊&圖片book
column17: If you want to know more about the rules of branch naming,\nplease refer to the game manual.
column18: 如果想要了解更多分支命名的規則的話\n請查看遊戲手冊

column7: 關閉粒子 手冊&黑屏&關閉圖片
column17: Now, like with commit messages,\nthis game allows you to quickly fill in the correct branch name.\nPlease follow these steps to create a branch:
column18: 接下來，就像提交訊息一樣\n本遊戲可以快速填入正確的分支名稱\n請您按照以下步驟來創建分支

column17: Step 1:\nOpen the 'Command Line' window.
column18: 第 1 步：\n開啟 '命令行' 視窗

column17: Step 2:\nEnter '<color=#CF001C>git branch</color>'.
column18: 第 2 步：\n請先輸入 '<color=#CF001C>git branch</color>'

column17: Step 3:\nAdd a space after the command,\nmaking it '<color=#CF001C>git branch </color>'.
column18: 第 3 步：\n在指令前方加一個空格\n變成 '<color=#CF001C>git branch </color>'

column17:
Step 4:
After completing the previous step,
press the Tab key or the search function button to open the branch naming window.
<color=#CF001C>Select the most suitable branch name</color> from the options.
column18:
第 4 步
完成前一步驟後
按下 Tab 鍵或搜尋功能按鈕，來開啟命名分支視窗
從選項中<color=#CF001C>選擇最合適的分支名稱</color>

column17:
Step 5:
After selecting the most suitable option,
the content in the input field should be:
'<color=#CF001C>git branch correct_branch_name</color>'.
column18:
第 5 步：
選擇最合適的選項後
輸入欄的內容應該會是：
<color=#CF001C>git branch 正確的分支命名</color>

column17: Okay, after updating the 'Commit History' window's content,\nyou will notice a new branch 'new-feature' has been added in the branch column.
column18: 好的，更新 '提交記錄' 視窗的內容\n會注意到分支欄位中\n新增了一個分支 'new-feature'

column17: Additionally, when you click on a commit,\nthe branch column now includes 'new-feature'.
column18: 此外，當您點擊提交後\n分支欄位多了一個 'new-feature'

column17: However, it is important to note that it still shows 'HEAD -> master',\nmeaning that HEAD is currently pointing to the 'master' branch.
column18: 但是，請注意現在還是 'HEAD -> master'\n表示 HEAD 目前指向 'master' 分支

column17: The command 'git branch branch-name' is only used to create a branch,\nand HEAD does not automatically switch to the newly created branch.
column18: git branch 分支名稱' 指令只用於創建分支\nHEAD 並不會自動切換到新創建的分支上

column17: Therefore, after creating a new branch,\ndon't forget to use the 'git checkout branch-name' command\nto switch to the newly created branch and start working on it.
column18: 所以在創建新分支後\n請不要忘記使用 'git checkout 分支名稱' 指令\n來切換到新創建的分支，以開始在新分支上工作

column17: Before starting to switch branches,\nlet's learn how to quickly check branches.
column18: 在開始切換分支之前\n讓我們先學習如何快速查看分支

column17: Excellent!\nAfter executing the new command 'git branch',\nthe command line listed all the current branch names.
column18: 很好！\n執行新的指令 'git branch' 後\n命令行列出了目前所有的分支名稱

column17: The branch marked with a <color=#CF001C>*</color> symbol\nshows the branch where HEAD is currently located.

column17: The color of the newly created fourth commit is different from the others.

column17: In this stage, let's try to delete this branch first.
column18: 在本次關卡中\n我們先試著將刪除這個分支吧

column17: The last command to learn in this stage is:\n'<color=#CF001C>git branch -d branch_name</color>'.
column18: 本次要學習的最後一個指令是\n'<color=#CF001C>git branch -d 分支名稱</color>'

column17: This command deletes the specified branch\nand removes its 'Commit History'.
column18: 這個指令可以刪除掉指定分支\n並刪除該分支中的 '提交記錄'

column17: git branch branch_name' is used to create a branch.\nadd '<color=#CF001C>-d</color>' (Delete) to the command\nturns it into a command to delete the branch.
column18: git branch 分支名稱' 是用來創建分支的指令\n而在指令中加入 '<color=#CF001C>-d</color>' (Delete 刪除)\n就變成刪除分支的指令

column17: However, before deleting the branch,\n<color=#CF001C>make sure that HEAD has moved to another branch</color>.
column18: 不過在刪除分支之前\n<color=#CF001C>請確保 HEAD 已經移動到其他分支</color>

column17: During this stage,\nwe have already been on the 'master' branch,\nso there's no need to move branches.
column18: 在關卡過程中\n已經位於 'master' 分支\n所以不需要移動分支

column17:
In this stage, we learned commands related to branch management:
'git branch' to view all branches in Git.
'git branch branch_name' to create a new branch.
'git branch -d branch_name' to delete a specified branch.
column18:
這次學習了與分支管理有關的指令
'git branch' 用於查看 Git 中所有的分支
'git branch 分支名稱' 用於創建一個新的分支
'git branch -d 分支名稱' 用於刪除一個指定分支

column17: In the next stage,\nwe will consider the situation from a different perspective.
column18: 在下個關卡中\n我們將換個角度思考本次發生的情況

column17: If the new feature is successfully developed,\nhow can we merge the commits from the new branch into the main branch?
column18: 如果新功能順利開發出來\n要如何將新分支的提交\n合併到主要分支呢？

column17: Finally, congratulations on completing this stage.\nYou did a great job!

column17: Welcome to the 'Fast-Forward Merging' stage!

column17: In this stage,\nwe will learn how to merge the changes from one branch into another.
column18: 在本次關卡中\n我們將學習如何將分支中的修改內容\n合併到另一個分支中

column17: We learned the basic branch management commands:\ncreate, view, and delete branches.

column17: While completing objectives,\nwe understood how the branch system can enhance the stability of the project.\nIt also prevents development branches from affecting the main branch.
column18: 在完成目標的過程中\n了解分支系統可以提升專案的穩定性\n避免開發中的分支影響到主分支

column17: The Git command we will learn this time is:\n''<color=#CF001C>git merge branch_name</color>'.\nThis command can merge the work contents of different branches.
column18: 本次要學習的 Git 指令是\n'<color=#CF001C>git merge 分支名稱</color>'\n這個指令能夠合併不同分支的工作內容

column17: It can be understood as:\n'<color=#CF001C>Merge the commit history of the targeted branch into the current branch we are in.</color>'
column18: 您可以理解成：\n「<color=#CF001C>將輸入分支的提交記錄合併到目前的分支</color>」

column17: However, please note that:\nIf you want to merge the 'new-feature' branch into the 'master' branch.
column18: 然而，請注意：\n如果想要將 'new-feature' 分支合併到 'master' 分支的話

column17: Finally, let's understand what merge modes are in Git.
column18: 最後，讓我們來了解什麼是 Git 的合併模式

column17: When attempting to execute the merge branch command,\nGit will automatically choose one of the merge modes\nbased on the complexity between the two branches.
column18: 在嘗試執行合併分支指令時\nGit 會根據兩個分支間的複雜度\n<color=#CF001C>自動選擇</color>不同的合併模式

column17:
Git will choose one of the following merge modes:
1. Fast-Forward Merge
2. Auto Merge
3. Merge Conflict
column18:
Git 會選擇下方一種合併模式：
1. 快進合併（Fast-Forward Merge）
2. 自動合併（Auto Merge）
3. 合併衝突（Merge Conflict）

column17: The merge mode for this time was 'Fast-Forward Merge',\nwhich is the simplest merge mode.
column18: 本次的合併模式為 '快進合併'，\n也是最為簡單的一種

column17: When the 'Commit History' of the two branches\n'look like a straight line, without forking to multiple lines',\nGit will use this mode to merge the branches.
column18: 當兩個分支的 '提交記錄'\n<color=#CF001C>呈現一條直線，沒有分叉</color>時\nGit 會使用這種模式合併分支

column17: Observing the 'Commit History' window,\nyou will notice that the 'new-feature' and 'master' branch commits are on the same line.
column18: 觀察 '提交記錄' 視窗\n會發現 'new-feature' 與 'master' 分支\n提交在同一條直線上

column17: In this case, the old branch (master) will 'update the commit history'.\nMerge the change contents in the 'new-feature' branch into the 'master' branch.
column18: 這種情況下\n舊的分支（master）會 '<color=#CF001C>更新提交記錄</color>'\n將 'new-feature' 分支的工作內容合併到 'master' 分支中

column17: In later stages,\nyou will encounter situations like commits fork into multiple paths.
column18: 在後面的關卡裡\n會遇到提交出現分叉的狀況

column17: We will further discuss the two merge modes of 'Auto Merge' and 'Merge Conflict'.
column18: 我們將進一步討論 '自動合併' 和 '合併衝突'\n這兩種合併模式

column17: Finally, congratulations on completing this stage.\nYou did very well!
column18: 最後，恭喜您完成本次的關卡\n您做得很好！

column17: Welcome to the 'Auto Merging' stage!

column17: In this case, Git will use the 'Auto Merge' mode.\nThis method will detect whether\nthere are conflicts between the changes in the two branches.
column18: 在這種情況下\nGit 將使用 '自動合併'（Auto Merge）\n這種方式會判斷兩個分支的修改內容是否存在衝突

column17: For example, if team members modify the same file on different branches.
column18: 例如，如果團隊成員在不同的分支上\n修改了同一個文件

column17: During the merging process,\nGit will notify team members that there are conflicts in these files.
column18: 合併過程中\nGit 將提醒團隊成員這個文件發生衝突

column17: At this point, you need to decide:\n'<color=#CF001C>which changes should be kept, and which should be discarded</color>'.
column18: 這時，您需要決定\n<color=#CF001C>哪些修改需要保留，哪些需要丟棄</color>

column17: This process is known as 'Merge Conflict,'\nwhich is the most complex type of Git merge mode.
column18: 這個過程是 '合併衝突'（Merge Conflict）\n也是最複雜的合併模式

column17: Don't need to worry!\nResolving merge conflicts is actually a simple step,\nand we will handle this situation at the next stage.
column18: 但是，請不要擔心！\n'解決合併衝突' 實際上是一個簡單的步驟\n我們在下一關中會處理這種情況

column17: Fast-forward merge occurs when the 'Commit History' of two branches\n'<color=#CF001C>is linear and without any divergence.</color>'
column18: 快進合併是當兩個分支的 '提交記錄'\n<color=#CF001C>呈現為線性、沒有分叉時</color>

column17: After the merge,\nthe merged branch <color=#CF001C>will not add any new commits</color>\nbut only update the 'Commit History'.

column17: Auto Merge occurs when the 'Commit History' of two branches\n'<color=#CF001C>diverges, creating multiple paths.</color>'

column17: In this mode,\nGit will detect whether file changes occur in conflict during the merge.

column17: If conflicts exist, developers need to resolve them manually.

column17: Next, let's merge the 'reset-score-feature' branch.\nBefore merging, let's predict which merge mode Git will use.
column18: 接下來，來合併 'reset-score-feature' 分支\n在合併前，我們一樣來預測 Git 將使用哪種合併模式

column17: Observing the 'Commit History',\nwe find that the 'master' and 'reset-score-feature' branches\nhave diverged into two separate paths.
column18: 觀察 '提交記錄'\n會發現 'master' 和 'reset-score-feature'\n分支之間的 '提交記錄' 分叉成兩個路徑

column17: In this case, Git will use Auto Merge and check\nif there are any file change conflicts made by the two branches.
column18: 在這種情況下，Git 將使用自動合併\n並檢查兩個分支的修改內容是否發生衝突

column17: From the commits,\nWe know that the 'add-score-feature' and 'reset-score-feature' branches\nhave modified the same file.
column18: 從提交中可以得知\n'add-score-feature' 和 'reset-score-feature' 分支\n都有修改相同的檔案

column17: When the same file has two different modifications,\nGit will notify the developer that there is a file conflict.
column18: 當同個檔案中存在兩種不同的修改時\nGit 將提醒開發者文件發生衝突

column17: It's important to note that:\nconflicts don’t mean we've made a mistake.\nThey are more common in team development.
column18: 需要注意的是\n衝突不代表我們執行了錯誤操作\n這在團隊開發時更為常見

column17: Since Git cannot determine on its own\nwhich parts of the changes need to be kept and which should be deleted.\nSo we need to manually resolve the file conflict.
column18: 由於 Git 無法自行判斷修改內容\n哪些部分需要保留，哪些需要刪除\n所以我們需要手動解決文件衝突

column13: FSMEvent("Quest Tracker/Add New Quest", "Quest Tracker Parent", "Quest Tracker");\nHighlightWindow("CommitHistoryWindow","");
column17: Next, try merging the 'reset-score-feature' branch.\nSo we can observe the impact of the file conflicts.
column18: 接下來，請先嘗試合併 'reset-score-feature' 分支\n來觀察文件發生衝突後產生的影響

column17: Great!\nYou attempted to merge the 'reset-score-feature' branch,\nbut the command line returned a 'merge conflict' message.
column18: 很好！\n您嘗試合併 'reset-score-feature' 分支\n但命令行返回了 '合併衝突' 訊息

column7: 高亮CommitHistory視窗&高亮CommandLine視窗&顯示Hint_CommitHistoryWindow&不顯示Hint_CommandHistoryDetailed
column17: The 'Commit History' shows that the merge was not executed successfully.
column18: 查看 '提交記錄' 會發現合併並未成功執行

column17: Because if we don't resolve file conflicts,\nthe branch cannot be further merged.
column18: 因為如果不解決文件衝突的話\n將無法繼續合併分支

column17: From the message in the command line,\nwe can identify which files have conflicts.
column18: 從命令行的訊息中\n可以知道哪些檔案內容發生了衝突

column17: Next, let's try to resolve the file conflict.\nLet's start with 'Game_Program.js'.
column18: 接下來，來試著解決檔案衝突吧\n我們先從 '遊戲程式.js' 開始

column7: 圖片windowOutline&(解鎖按鈕 - 檔案管理)
column17: To resolve the conflict,\nwe need to find the file in the 'Working Directory'.
column18: 要解決衝突\n需要先從 '工作目錄' 中找到對應的檔案

column13: FSMEvent("Quest Tracker/Add New Quest", "Quest Tracker Parent", "Quest Tracker");
column17: Please open the 'File Manager' window\nand review the contents of 'Game_Program.js'.
column18: 請您先開啟 '檔案管理' 視窗\n查看 '遊戲程式.js' 內容

column17: Okay, after opening the file,\nthere are some special symbols have been added.\nLet's understand the changes in the file content.
column18: 好的，開啟檔案後\n會發現檔案裡新增了一些特殊符號\n我們來了解檔案內容的變化

column17: The first line, 'Set initial score to 0'.\nIt contains both the 'add-score-feature' and 'reset-score-feature' branches.
column18: 第一行的 '將初始分數設為 0'\n'add-score-feature' 和 'reset-score-feature' 分支\n都有這段程式碼

column17: Since the changes in both branches are the same,\nthis line didn't cause a conflict.
column18: 由於兩個分支的修改是相同的\n所以這行沒有發生衝突

column17: Next, the content is enclosed by special symbols '<', '=', and '>'.\nIt shows the place where the file conflict occurred.
column18: 再來，由特殊符號 '<'、'='、'>' 包起來的內容\n就是文件發生衝突的段落

column17: The area enclosed by '<<< HEAD' and '===',\nwhich means the modification in the current branch.
column18: 其中，由 '<<< HEAD' 和 '===' 包起來的區域\n表示當前分支的修改內容

column17: Since we are on the latest commit of the 'master' branch,\nthis area contains the code for the 'add score' feature.
column18: 我們位於 'master' 分支上的最新提交\n所以區域中是 '增加分數功能' 程式碼

column17: Next, the area enclosed by '===' and '>>> reset-score-feature'.\nIt shows the modifications in the 'reset-score-feature' branch.
column18: 接下來，由 '===' 和 '>>> reset-score-feature' 包括起來的區域\n表示在 'reset-score-feature' 分支的修改內容

column17: From the commit,\nwe know that the 'reset-score-feature' branch\nadded the 'reset score' feature.
column18: 從提交可以得知\n在 'reset-score-feature' 分支上\n新增 '重置分數功能' 程式碼

column17: After understanding the file content,\nlet's resolve the file conflict.
column18: 在了解檔案內容後\n讓我們來解決文件衝突吧

column17: According to the background story,\nwe should keep the changes from both branches.\nThe game can't run correctly without them.
column18: 根據故事背景\n我們應該留下兩個分支的功能\n遊戲才能順利遊玩

column17: Therefore, you need to delete the lines with\nspecial separation symbols ('<<<', '===', '>>>')\nThere are 3 lines in total.
column18: 因此，您需要將文件中的分隔特殊符號 （'<<<'、'==='、'>>>'）\n總計 3 行的內容刪除

column17: This means that we are keeping the modifications from both branches.
column18: 這表示我們要同時保留\n兩個分支的修改內容

column17: Great job!\nYou've successfully resolved the file conflict.
column18: 非常出色！\n您已經解決檔案中的文件衝突

column17: After resolving the conflict,\nthe file now contains the code for initializing the score\nand the features developed in both branches.
column18: 在解決衝突後\n檔案裡包含了初始化分數的程式碼\n以及兩個分支開發的功能

column17: Through this operation,\nyou may have noticed that 'resolving merge conflicts'\nis not as complicated as it might seem.
column18: 通過操作\n您會發現 '解決合併衝突' 並沒有那麼複雜

column17: When file conflicts occur,\nthe team might discuss how to handle conflicting files.\nThe difficulty of resolving merge conflicts often depends on the complexity of the project.
column18: 當發生文件衝突時\n團隊可能會一起討論如何處理衝突的文件\n而合併衝突的難易程度通常取決於專案的複雜性

column17: Excellent!\nYou've successfully resolved the file conflict in 'Game_Webpage.html'.
column18: 非常出色！\n您成功解決 '遊戲網頁.html' 的文件衝突

column17: You've kept the changes from both branches,\nand now the webpage should have two buttons.
column18: 您保留了兩個分支的修改內容\n現在網頁中應該會有兩個按鈕

column17: After resolving all the conflicts in the files,\nplease create a new commit to save these resolved file changes.
column18: 當解決所有衝突的檔案後\n請為這些檔案新建一個提交\n來保存這些解決衝突的檔案內容
